name: Secret Kingdom Defenders
storyline: "A young monk is making a fateful journey westward, but he can't do it alone! Along the way, he'll encounter deadly monsters, friendly pigs, flying dragon knights, and greatest of all, a mischievous Monkey King determined to test the monk's strength of will..."
summary: "A classic Chinese tale comes to life in this fresh take on the classic hero defense game. Choose your defenders, arm them with powerful gear, and use their unique abilities to banish the forces of evil!"
